                                                       int numCustomersToBeNotified)
        Specified by:
        getCustomersToNotify in interface ProductNotifier
        Parameters:
        productId - the product id for which the customer needs to be notified
        scheme - one of SCHEME_FIFO or SCHEME_PRIME_FIRST
        numCustomersToBeNotified - number of customers to be notified
        Returns:
        the list of customer IDs to be notified

      • notifyMe

        public void notifyMe(long productId,
            Customer customer)
        This method adds the customers interested in the product to a list for simulating purposes; In real world scenario add them to database here using a web service call (ideally a REST based POST request)
        Specified by:
        notifyMe in interface ProductNotifier
        Parameters:
        productId - the product id for which the customer needs to be notified
        customer - the Customer to be notified
